module.name: conductivity_material_aspects
module.keywords: module, thermal, electrical, photonic, optical, magnetic, material, conductivity

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of classification of material conductivity properties. Classification is supported with respect to conductivity of material in electric, magnetic, thermal and optical domains. Principle application of the classification is to establish design rules for connectivity implementation in an interconnect substrate. The default application is electrically conductive for metalized layers and electrically nonconductive for dielectric layers.

inscope.li: items within the scope of Generic_material_aspects_arm;
items within the scope of Part_view_definition_arm;
items within the scope of Property_assignment_arm.

outscope.li: specific values of properties of materials

ae.refpath: general_material_property <= general_property {(general_property.name = 'magnetic conductivity') (general_property.name = 'optical conductivity') (general_property.name = 'thermal conductivity') (general_property.name = 'electrical conductivity')}

material_designation {material_designation <- material_designation_characterization.designation material_designation_characterization.property -> characterized_material_property characterized_material_property = material_property_representation material_property_representation <= property_definition_representation {property_definition_representation.used_representation -> representation} property_definition_representation.definition -> represented_definition represented_definition = property_definition property_definition {property_definition => material_property} derived_property_select = property_definition derived_property_select <- general_property_association.derived_definition general_property_association general_property_association.base_definition -> general_property general_property => general_material_property {(general_property.name = 'magnetic conductivity') (general_property.name = 'optical conductivity') (general_property.name = 'thermal conductivity') (general_property.name = 'electrical conductivity')}}
